name: Wash Away (Javier Egea)
description:
Global Game Jam 2021

Who has never lost a sock thinking that it was in the laundry basket or in the washing machine, in Wash Away we will take control of "Lucky" an intrepid sock who will plunge into a great adventure in order to return home, with his other pair. Wash Away is a platform and puzzle video game where we must make our way avoiding obstacles and solving small riddles in order to return to our home.

Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/wash-away-2

Instrucciones
  • Use A and D for moving your character
  • Use Spacebar for jumping
  • Esc por the pause menu
  • If you get stucked use the retry button in the pause menu
